title: Emotional Expression
description: More detailed and expressive B1 emotional sentences.

steps.teacher: 最近我有點緊張，但同時也覺得很期待。
expected_answer: 最近我有點緊張，但同時也覺得很期待。
steps.pinyin: zuì jìn wǒ yǒu diǎn jǐn zhāng, dàn tóng shí yě jué dé hěn qī dài.
steps.english_hint: Lately I'm a bit nervous, but also excited.

steps.teacher: 有些事情讓我有點失望，但我還是想試著理解。
expected_answer: 有些事情讓我有點失望，但我還是想試著理解。
steps.pinyin: yǒu xiē shì qíng ràng wǒ yǒu diǎn shī wàng, dàn wǒ hái shì xiǎng shì zhe lǐ jiě.
steps.english_hint: Some things disappointed me a bit, but I still want to understand.

steps.teacher: 我覺得今天的心情比前幾天放鬆多了。
expected_answer: 我覺得今天的心情比前幾天放鬆多了。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jué dé jīn tiān de xīn qíng bǐ qián jǐ tiān fàng sōng duō le.
steps.english_hint: I feel much more relaxed today than the past few days.

steps.teacher: 有時候我會對自己太嚴格。
expected_answer: 有時候我會對自己太嚴格。
steps.pinyin: yǒu shí hòu wǒ huì duì zì jǐ tài yán gé.
steps.english_hint: Sometimes I'm too strict with myself.

steps.teacher: 當有人支持我時，我會覺得更有力量。
expected_answer: 當有人支持我時，我會覺得更有力量。
steps.pinyin: dāng yǒu rén zhī chí wǒ shí, wǒ huì jué dé gèng yǒu lì liàng.
steps.english_hint: I feel stronger when someone supports me.

steps.teacher: 我正在學習如何把壓力放下。
expected_answer: 我正在學習如何把壓力放下。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài xué xí rú hé bǎ yā lì fàng xià.
steps.english_hint: I'm learning how to let go of stress.

steps.teacher: 有些擔心是正常的，我接受這一點。
expected_answer: 有些擔心是正常的，我接受這一點。
steps.pinyin: yǒu xiē dān xīn shì zhèng cháng de, wǒ jiē shòu zhè yì diǎn.
steps.english_hint: Feeling worried is normal; I accept that.

steps.teacher: 我覺得自己正在慢慢變得更堅強。
expected_answer: 我覺得自己正在慢慢變得更堅強。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jué dé zì jǐ zhèng zài màn màn biàn dé gèng jiān qiáng.
steps.english_hint: I feel I’m slowly becoming stronger.

steps.teacher: 我正在努力調整心態，希望能更平穩。
expected_answer: 我正在努力調整心態，希望能更平穩。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài nǔ lì tiáo zhěng xīn tài, xī wàng néng gèng píng wěn.
steps.english_hint: I'm working on adjusting my mindset to stay calmer.

steps.teacher: 雖然偶爾會低落，但我知道自己會好起來。
expected_answer: 雖然偶爾會低落，但我知道自己會好起來。
steps.pinyin: suī rán ǒu ěr huì dī luò, dàn wǒ zhī dào zì jǐ huì hǎo qǐ lái.
steps.english_hint: Although I feel down sometimes, I know I’ll get better.

review.summary: You learned advanced emotional expressions at B1.
review.mission: Final lesson next: full dialogue & integrated skills!
